title-part.text: PREPARING CLAY
PRODUCING MIXTURES CONTAINING CLAY OR CEMENTITIOUS MATERIAL, e.g. PLASTER

reference.text: preparing material for foundry moulds B22C5/00

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following terms or expressions are used with the meanings indicated: "cement" or "mixtures of cement with other substance" includes plaster;"clay" includes like ceramic compositions.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

note.note-paragraph: In groups B28C3/00 - B28C7/00, the following term is used with the meaning indicated: "mixing" includes preliminary mixing, e.g. of some of the ingredients final mixing, and agitating the mixture to prevent segregation thereof
